com.vaadin.polymer.iron

Interface IronButtonState


  • @JsType(isNative=true)
public interface IronButtonState

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String NAME 
      static String SRC 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getActive()
      If true, the button is a toggle and is currently in the active state.
      String getAriaActiveAttribute()
      The aria attribute to be set if the button is a toggle and in the
      active state.
      com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject getKeyBindings()
      JavaScript Info:
      boolean getPointerDown()
      True if the element is currently being pressed by a “pointer,” which
      is loosely defined as mouse or touch input (but specifically excluding
      keyboard input).
      boolean getPressed()
      If true, the user is currently holding down the button.
      boolean getReceivedFocusFromKeyboard()
      True if the input device that caused the element to receive focus
      was a keyboard.
      boolean getToggles()
      If true, the button toggles the active state with each tap or press
      of the spacebar.
      void setActive(boolean value)
      If true, the button is a toggle and is currently in the active state.
      void setAriaActiveAttribute(String value)
      The aria attribute to be set if the button is a toggle and in the
      active state.
      void setKeyBindings(com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject value)
      JavaScript Info:
      void setPointerDown(boolean value)
      True if the element is currently being pressed by a “pointer,” which
      is loosely defined as mouse or touch input (but specifically excluding
      keyboard input).
      void setPressed(boolean value)
      If true, the user is currently holding down the button.
      void setReceivedFocusFromKeyboard(boolean value)
      True if the input device that caused the element to receive focus
      was a keyboard.
      void setToggles(boolean value)
      If true, the button toggles the active state with each tap or press
      of the spacebar.
